detailView.sql: SELECT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, taxon.CommonName, agentvariant.Name, %s FROM fragment INNER JOIN determination ON determination.FragmentID = fragment.FragmentID INNER JOIN agent ON determination.DeterminerID = agent.AgentID LEFT JOIN (agentvariant ON agent.AgentID=agentvariant.AgentID AND agentvariant.VarType=4) INNER JOIN taxon ON determination.TaxonID = taxon.TaxonID WHERE determination.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND determination.IsCurrent = true AND %s

SELECT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, locality.LocalityName, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, collectingevent.EndDate, locality.Latitude1, locality.Longitude1, %s From collectingevent Inner Join locality ON collectingevent.LocalityID = locality.LocalityID WHERE collectingevent.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s order by StartDate

SELECT DISTINCT fragment.FragmentID, fragment.Identifier, taxon.FullName, %s From fragment Left Join determination ON determination.FragmentID = fragment.FragmentID Inner Join taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = determination.TaxonID Inner Join collectionobject ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = fragment.CollectionObjectID Inner Join preparation ON preparation.PreparationID = fragment.PreparationID WHERE fragment.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s order by fragment.Identifier asc

SELECT DISTINCT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, geography.FullName, %s FROM geography INNER JOIN locality ON locality.geographyid = geography.geographyid INNER JOIN collectingevent ON locality.LocalityID = collectingevent.LocalityID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectionobject.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN fragment ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = fragment.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN determination ON fragment.FragmentID = determination.FragmentID Inner Join taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = determination.TaxonID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND determination.IsCurrent = true AND %s

SELECT fragment.FragmentID, fragment.Identifier, CatalogedDate, CatalogedDatePrecision, StartDate, StartDatePrecision, agentvariant.Name, collector.OrderNumber, %s FROM fragment INNER JOIN collectionobject ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN collectingevent ON collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collectingevent.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN collector ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collector.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN agent ON collector.AgentID = agent.AgentID LEFT JOIN (agentvariant ON agent.AgentID=agentvariant.AgentID AND agentvariant.VarType=4) WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY fragment.FragmentID, collector.OrderNumber
SELECT t1.TaxonID, t1.FullName, t2.FullName, %s FROM taxon t1 INNER JOIN taxon t2 ON t1.AcceptedID = t2.TaxonID WHERE %s

SELECT DISTINCT f.FragmentID, f.Identifier, t.FullName, t2.FullName, %s FROM fragment f INNER JOIN determination d ON d.FragmentID = f.FragmentID INNER JOIN taxon t ON d.TaxonID = t.TaxonID INNER JOIN taxon t2 ON t2.TaxonID = d.PreferredTaxonID WHERE d.TaxonId <> d.PreferredTaxonId AND t.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND f.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s

SELECT DISTINCT f.FragmentID, f.Identifier, deterTax.FullName, acceptTax.FullName, oldTax.FullName, %s FROM fragment f INNER JOIN determination d ON d.FragmentID = f.FragmentID INNER JOIN taxon deterTax ON d.TaxonID = deterTax.TaxonID INNER JOIN taxon acceptTax ON d.PreferredTaxonID = acceptTax.TaxonID INNER JOIN taxon oldTax ON oldTax.AcceptedID = acceptTax.TaxonID AND oldTax.TaxonID != d.TaxonID WHERE f.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s

SELECT distinct fragment.FragmentID, fragment.Identifier, FullName, %s From fragment Inner Join determination AS DT ON DT.FragmentID = fragment.FragmentID Inner Join taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = DT.TaxonID WHERE DT.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND fragment.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND taxon.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND DT.IsCurrent = true AND %s order by fragment.Identifier asc

SELECT agent.AgentID, agentvariant.Name, agentvariant.VarType, agent.DateOfBirth, agent.DateOfBirthPrecision, agent.DateOfDeath, agent.DateOfDeathPrecision, agent.DatesType, %s FROM agent INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID INNER JOIN agentvariant ON agent.AgentID = agentvariant.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s order by agentvariant.Name asc

SELECT fragment.FragmentID, fragment.Identifier, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, collectingevent.EndDate, collectingevent.EndDatePrecision, %s From collectingevent Inner Join collectionobject ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectionobject.CollectingEventID Inner Join fragment ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID WHERE collectingevent.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s order by StartDate

SELECT fragment.FragmentID, fragment.Identifier, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, locality.LocalityName, locality.Latitude1, locality.Longitude1, %s FROM locality INNER JOIN collectingevent ON locality.LocalityID = collectingevent.LocalityID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectionobject.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN fragment ON collectionbject.CollectionObjectID = fragment.CollectionObjectID WHERE locality.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND collectionobject.collectionmemberid = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY StartDate

SELECT preparation.PreparationID, preparation.Identifier, taxon.fullName, accession.AccessionNumber, %s FROM preparation INNER JOIN accession ON accession.accessionid = preparation.AccessionID INNER JOIN fragment ON fragment.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN determination ON determination.FragmentID = fragment.FragmentID INNER JOIN taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = determination.TaxonID WHERE determination.IsCurrent AND collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY AccessionNumber, preparation.Identifier

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, accessionagent.Role, accession.AccessionNumber, %s FROM accession INNER JOIN accessionagent ON accessionagent.accessionid = accession.accessionid INNER JOIN agent ON agent.agentid = accessionagent.agentid INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.disciplineid = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY AccessionNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT agent.AgentID, borrow.InvoiceNumber, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, borrowagent.Role, %s FROM borrow INNER JOIN borrowagent ON borrowagent.borrowid = borrow.borrowid INNER JOIN agent ON agent.agentid = borrowagent.agentid INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.disciplineid = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY InvoiceNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT agent.AgentID, appraisal.AppraisalNumber, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, %s FROM appraisal INNER JOIN agent ON agent.agentid = appraisal.agentid INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.disciplineid = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY AppraisalNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, geologictimeperiod.FullName, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, %s FROM geologictimeperiod INNER JOIN paleocontext ON paleocontext.chronosstratid = geologictimeperiod.geologictimeperiodid INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.paleocontextid = paleocontext.paleocontextid WHERE collectionobject.collectionmemberid = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY FullName, collectionobject.CatalogNumber

SELECT agent.AgentID, agentvariant.Name, collector.OrderNumber, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, %s FROM collectingevent INNER JOIN collector ON collector.collectingeventid = collectingevent.collectingeventid INNER JOIN agent ON agent.agentid = collector.agentid LEFT JOIN (agentvariant ON agent.AgentID=agentvariant.AgentID AND agentvariant.VarType=4) WHERE %s ORDER BY LastName, FirstName, StartDate, StationFieldNumber

SELECT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, collectingtrip.CollectingTripName, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, %s FROM collectingevent INNER JOIN collectingtrip ON collectingtrip.CollectingTripID = collectingevent.CollectingTripID WHERE %s ORDER BY CollectingTripName, StartDate, StationFieldNumber

SELECT exchangein.ExchangeInID, exchangein.ExchangeDate, exchangein.DescriptionOfMaterial, agent.Abbreviation, %s FROM exchangein INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = exchangein.ReceivedFromOrganizationID WHERE %s ORDER BY ExchangeDate, DescriptionOfMaterial

SELECT exchangeout.ExchangeOutID, exchangeout.ExchangeDate, exchangeout.DescriptionOfMaterial, agent.Abbreviation, %s FROM exchangeout INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = exchangeout.SentToOrganizationID WHERE %s ORDER BY ExchangeDate, DescriptionOfMaterial

SELECT DISTINCT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, collectingevent.StartDate, collectingevent.StartDatePrecision, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, geography.FullName, %s FROM geography INNER JOIN locality ON locality.GeographyID = geography.GeographyID INNER JOIN collectingevent on collectingevent.LocalityID = locality.LocalityID WHERE collectingevent.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY FullName,StartDate

SELECT DISTINCT fragment.FragmentID, fragment.Identifier, geography.FullName, %s FROM geography INNER JOIN locality ON locality.GeographyID = geography.GeographyID INNER JOIN collectingevent on collectingevent.LocalityID = locality.lLocalityID INNER JOIN collectionobject on collectionobject.CollectingEventID = collectingevent.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN fragment on fragment.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID WHERE %s AND collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID ORDER BY FullName,collectionobject.CatalogNumber

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, preptype.Name, gift.GiftNumber, %s FROM gift INNER JOIN giftpreparation ON giftpreparation.GiftID = gift.GiftID INNER JOIN preparation on preparation.PreparatioNID = giftpreparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN preptype on preptype.PrepTypeID = preparation.PrepTypeID INNER JOIN fragment on fragment.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN collectionobject on collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = fragment.CollectionObjectID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY GiftNumber,collectionobject.CatalogNumber,Name

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, giftagent.Role, gift.GiftNumber, %s FROM gift INNER JOIN giftagent ON giftagent.GiftID = gift.GifTID INNER JOIN agent on agent.AgentID = giftagent.AgentID WHERE %s ORDER BY GiftNumber,Role,LastName,FirstName

SELECT fragment.FragmentID, fragment.Identifier, preptype.Name, loan.LoanNumber, %s FROM loan INNER JOIN loanpreparation ON loanpreparation.LoanID = loan.LoanID INNER JOIN preparation on preparation.PreparationID = loanpreparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN preptype on preptype.PrepTypeID = preparation.PrepTypeID INNER JOIN fragment on fragment.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID WHERE %s ORDER BY LoanNumber,fragment.Identifier,preparation.Identifier,Name

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, loanagent.Role, loan.LoanNumber, %s FROM loan INNER JOIN loanagent ON loanagent.loanid = loan.loanid INNER JOIN agent on agent.agentid = loanagent.agentid WHERE %s ORDER BY LoanNumber,Role,LastName,FirstName

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, lithostrat.FullName, %s FROM lithostrat INNER JOIN paleocontext ON paleocontext.LithoStratID = lithostrat.LithoStratID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.PaleoContextID = paleocontext.PaleoContextID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY FullName, collectionobject.CatalogNumber

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, permit.PermitNumber, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN accessionauthorization ON accessionauthorization.PermitID = permit.PermitID INNER JOIN accession ON accession.AccessionID = accessionauthorization.AccessionID INNER JOIN preparation ON preparation.AccessionID = accession.AccessionID INNER JOIN fragment ON fragment.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY PermitNumber, collectionobject.CatalogNumber

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, permit.PermitNumber, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = permit.IssuedToID INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.disciplineid = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY PermitNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, permit.PermitNumber, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = permit.IssuedByID INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.disciplineid = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY PermitNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, project.ProjectName, project.ProjectNumber, %s FROM project INNER JOIN project_colobj ON project_colobj.ProjectID = project.ProjectID INNER JOIN collectionobject ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = project_colobj.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN fragment ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionmemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY ProjectName, ProjectNumber, fragment.Identifier

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, project.ProjectName, project.ProjectNumber, %s FROM project INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = project.ProjectAgentID INNER JOIN agent_discipline on agent_discipline.AgentID = agent.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.disciplineid = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY ProjectName, ProjectNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementNumber, %s FROM repositoryagreement INNER JOIN agent ON agent.AgentID = repositoryagreement.AgentID INNER JOIN agent_discipline on agent_discipline.AgentID = agent.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s ORDER BY RepositoryAgreementNumber, LastName, FirstName

SELECT DISTINCT fragment.FragmentID, fragment.Identifier, storage.FullName, %s FROM storage INNER JOIN preparation ON preparation.StorageID = storage.StorageID INNER JOIN fragment ON fragment.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID WHERE fragment.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s ORDER BY FullName, fragment.Identifier, preparation.Identifier

SELECT distinct fragment.FragmentID, fragment.Identifier, IsCurrent, FullName, %s From fragment Inner Join determination AS DT ON DT.FragmentID = collectionobject.FragmentID Inner Join taxon ON taxon.TaxonID = DT.TaxonID WHERE DT.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND f.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND taxon.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND %s order by FullName, fragment.Identifier

SELECT distinct fragment.FragmentID, fragment.Identifier, preparation.Identifier, preparation.SampleNumber, collectionobject.CatalogedDate, collectionobject.CatalogedDatePrecision, %s From collectionobject Inner Join fragment ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID Inner Join preparation ON preparation.PreparationID = fragment.PreparationID WHERE preparation.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s order by fragment.Identifier, preparation.Identifier, preparation.SampleNumber

SELECT referencework.ReferenceWorkID, referenceworkvariant.Name, referencework.Text1, %s FROM referencework INNER JOIN referenceworkvariant ON referencework.ReferenceWorkID = referenceworkvariant.ReferenceWorkID WHERE %s order by referenceworkvariant.Name asc

SELECT distinct preparation.PreparationID, preparation.Identifier, preparation.SampleNumber, fragment.Identifier, collectionobject.CatalogedDate, collectionobject.CatalogedDatePrecision, %s From preparation Inner Join fragment ON fragment.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID Inner Join collectionobject ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID WHERE preparation.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s order by fragment.Identifier, preparation.Identifier, preparation.SampleNumber

SELECT distinct preparation.PreparationID, preparation.Identifier, fragment.Identifier, collectionobject.FieldNumber, collectionobject.CatalogedDate, collectionobject.CatalogedDatePrecision, %s From preparation Inner Join fragment ON fragment.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID Inner Join collectionobject ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID WHERE preparation.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s order by fragment.Identifier, preparation.Identifier, preparation.SampleNumber

SELECT distinct collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.FieldNumber, collectionobject.CatalogedDate, collectionobject.CatalogedDatePrecision, fragment.Identifier, preparation.PreparationID, preparation.Identifier, %s From collectionobject Inner Join fragment ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID Inner Join preparation ON fragment.PreparationID = preparation.PreparationID WHERE preparation.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s order by fragment.Identifier, preparation.Identifier, preparation.SampleNumber

SELECT distinct collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.FieldNumber, collectionobject.CatalogedDate, collectionobject.CatalogedDatePrecision, fragment.Identifier, %s From collectionobject Inner Join fragment ON fragment.CollectionObjectID = collectionobject.CollectionObjectID WHERE collectionobject.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND %s order by fragment.Identifier

SELECT distinct bo.BorrowID, bo.InvoiceNumber, bo.ReceivedDate, bom.MaterialNumber, bom.SrcTaxonomy, %s From borrow bo Inner Join borrowmaterial bom ON bo.BorrowID = bom.BorrowID WHERE %s order by bo.InvoiceNumber, bom.MaterialNumber

SELECT distinct bo.BorrowID, bo.InvoiceNumber, bo.ReceivedDate, bom.MaterialNumber, bom.SrcTaxonomy, %s From borrow bo Inner Join borrowmaterial bom ON bo.BorrowID = bom.BorrowID WHERE %s order by bo.InvoiceNumber, bom.MaterialNumber

SELECT agentvariant.AgentVariantID, agentvariant.Name, agentvariant.VarType, agent.DateOfBirth, agent.DateOfBirthPrecision, agent.DateOfDeath, agent.DateOfDeathPrecision, agent.DatesType, %s FROM agent INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON agent.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID INNER JOIN agentvariant ON agent.AgentID = agentvariant.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND %s order by agentvariant.Name asc

SELECT accession.AccessionID, accession.AccessionNumber, attachment.Title, %s FROM accession INNER JOIN accessionattachment ON accession.AccessionID = accessionattachment.AccessionID INNER JOIN attachment ON accessionattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT agent.AgentID, agent.LastName, agent.FirstName, attachment.Title, %s FROM agent INNER JOIN agentattachment ON agent.AgentID = agentattachment.AgentID INNER JOIN attachment ON agentattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT collectingevent.CollectingEventID, collectingevent.StationFieldNumber, attachment.Title, %s FROM collectingevent INNER JOIN collectingeventattachment ON collectingevent.CollectingEventID = collectingeventattachment.CollectingEventID INNER JOIN attachment ON collectingeventattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT collectionobject.CollectionObjectID, collectionobject.CatalogNumber, attachment.Title, %s FROM collectionobject INNER JOIN collectionobjectattachment ON collectionobject.CollectionObjectID = collectionobjectattachment.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN attachment ON collectionobjectattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT conservdescription.ConservDescriptionID, conservdescription.ShortDesc, attachment.Title, %s FROM conservdescription INNER JOIN conservdescriptionattachment ON conservdescription.ConservDescriptionID = conservdescriptionattachment.ConservDescriptionID INNER JOIN attachment ON conservdescriptionattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT conservevent.ConservEventID, conservevent.ExamDate, conservevent.TreatmentCompDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM conservevent INNER JOIN conserveventattachment ON conservevent.ConservEventID = conserveventattachment.ConservEventID INNER JOIN attachment ON conserveventattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT fieldnotebook.FieldNotebookID, fieldnotebook.Name, fieldnotebook.StartDate, fieldnotebook.EndDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM fieldnotebook INNER JOIN fieldnotebookattachment ON fieldnotebook.FieldNotebookID = fieldnotebookattachment.FieldNotebookID INNER JOIN attachment ON fieldnotebookattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT fieldnotebookpage.FieldNotebookPageID, fieldnotebookpage.PageNumber, fieldnotebookpage.ScanDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM fieldnotebookpage INNER JOIN fieldnotebookpageattachment ON fieldnotebookpage.FieldNotebookPageID = fieldnotebookpageattachment.FieldNotebookPageID INNER JOIN attachment ON fieldnotebookpageattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT fieldnotebookpageset.FieldNotebookPageSetID, fieldnotebookpageset.OrderNumber, fieldnotebookpageset.StartDate, fieldnotebookpageset.EndDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM fieldnotebookpageset INNER JOIN fieldnotebookpagesetattachment ON fieldnotebookpageset.FieldNotebookPageSetID = fieldnotebookpagesetattachment.FieldNotebookPageSetID INNER JOIN attachment ON fieldnotebookpagesetattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT locality.LocalityID, locality.LocalityName, attachment.Title, %s FROM locality INNER JOIN localityattachment ON locality.LocalityID = localityattachment.LocalityID INNER JOIN attachment ON localityattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT permit.PermitID, permit.PermitNumber, permit.IssuedDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM permit INNER JOIN permitattachment ON permit.PermitID = permitattachment.PermitID INNER JOIN attachment ON permitattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT preparation.PreparationID, preparation.PreparedDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM preparation INNER JOIN preparationattachment ON preparation.PreparationID = preparationattachment.PreparationID INNER JOIN attachment ON preparationattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementID, repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementNumber, repositoryagreement.StartDate, attachment.Title, %s FROM repositoryagreement INNER JOIN repositoryagreementattachment ON repositoryagreement.RepositoryAgreementID = repositoryagreementattachment.RepositoryAgreementID INNER JOIN attachment ON repositoryagreementattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT taxon.TaxonID, taxon.FullName, taxon.CommonName, taxon.TaxonomicSerialNumber, attachment.Title, attachment.OrigFilename, %s FROM taxon INNER JOIN taxonattachment ON taxon.TaxonID = taxonattachment.TaxonID INNER JOIN attachment ON taxonattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT fragment.FragmentID, fragment.Identifier, attachment.Title, %s FROM fragment INNER JOIN fragmentattachment ON fragment.FragmentID = fragmentattachment.FragmentID INNER JOIN attachment ON fragmentattachment.AttachmentID = attachment.AttachmentID WHERE %s

SELECT ag.AgentID, ag.FirstName, ag.LastName, ag.EMail, ad.Address, ad.City, ad.State, ad.Postalcode, ad.Country FROM agent ag INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON ag.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID LEFT JOIN address ad ON ag.AgentID = ad.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) GROUP BY ag.AgentID ORDER BY ag.LastName, ag.FirstName

SELECT permit.PermitID, pr.PermitNumber, ag.LastName, pr.IssuedDate, pr.StartDate, pr.EndDate, pr.RenewalDate, pr.Type FROM permit pr LEFT JOIN agent ag ON pr.IssuedByID = ag.AgentID WHERE (%s) ORDER BY pr.PermitNumber
SELECT ac.AccessionID, ac.AccessionNumber, ac.Status, ac.Type, ac.DateAccessioned, ac.DateReceived FROM accession ac WHERE (%s) ORDER BY ac.AccessionNumber

SELECT geo.GeographyID, geo.Name, geo.FullName, gtdi.Name FROM geography geo INNER JOIN geographytreedefitem gtdi ON geo.GeographyTreeDefItemID = gtdi.GeographyTreeDefItemID WHERE geo.GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID AND (%s) ORDER BY geo.RankID, geo.Name
select ppt.PrepTypeID, ppt.Name from preptype ppt where ppt.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY ppt.Name
SELECT dsp.DisciplineID, dsp.Type, dsp.Name FROM discipline dsp WHERE (%s) ORDER BY dsp.Name
SELECT CatalogNumberingSchemeID, SchemeName, IsNumericOnly FROM catalognumberingscheme WHERE (%s) ORDER BY SchemeName
SELECT tx.TaxonID, tx.RankID, tx.FullName, tx.Author FROM taxon tx WHERE tx.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND (%s) ORDER BY tx.RankID, tx.Name
SELECT ag.AgentID, ag.FirstName, ag.LastName, ag.MiddleInitial FROM agent ag WHERE ag.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY ag.LastName, ag.FirstName, ag.MiddleInitial
SELECT lcn.StorageID, lcn.FullName, lcn.Text2, lcn.Text1 FROM storage lcn WHERE lcn.StorageTreeDefID = STORTREEDEFID AND (%s) ORDER BY lcn.FullName
SELECT gtp.GeologicTimePeriodID, gtp.FullName FROM geologictimeperiod gtp WHERE gtp.GeologicTimePeriodTreeDefID = GTPTREEDEFID AND (%s) ORDER BY gtp.FullName
SELECT ls.LithoStratID, ls.FullName FROM lithostrat ls WHERE ls.LithoStratTreeDefID = LITHOTREEDEFID AND (%s) ORDER BY ls.FullName
SELECT pc.PaleoContextID, pc.TopDistance, pc.DistanceUnits FROM paleocontext pc WHERE pc.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY pc.TopDistance

SELECT DISTINCT ln.LoanID, ln.LoanNumber, ln.LoanDate, ln.CurrentDueDate, ln.OriginalDueDate FROM loan ln INNER JOIN loanpreparation lpo ON ln.LoanID = lpo.LoanID INNER JOIN preparation pp ON lpo.PreparationID = pp.PreparationID INNER JOIN fragment frag ON pp.PreparationID = frag.FragmentID INNER JOIN collectionobject co ON frag.CollectionObjectID = co.CollectionObjectID INNER JOIN collection col ON co.CollectionID = col.CollectionID INNER JOIN specifyuser spu ON collectiontype.SpecifyUserID = spu.SpecifyUserID WHERE spu.SpecifyUserID = SPECIFYUSERID AND ln.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (not (ln.CurrentDueDate is null)) AND (ln.IsClosed = false or ln.IsClosed is null) AND datediff(CURDATE(), ln.CurrentDueDate) > 0 ORDER BY ln.LoanDate
SELECT loc.LocalityID, loc.LocalityName, loc.Latitude1, loc.Longitude1 FROM locality loc WHERE loc.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) ORDER BY loc.LocalityName
SELECT att.AttachmentID, att.OrigFilename FROM attachment att WHERE (%s) ORDER BY att.OrigFilename

SELECT co.CollectionObjectID, av.Name, co.FieldNumber, ce.StartDate, ce.StartDatePrecision FROM collectionobject co LEFT JOIN collectingevent ce ON co.CollectingEventID=ce.CollectingEventID LEFT JOIN collector ctr ON ce.CollectingEventID=ctr.CollectingEventID LEFT JOIN agentvariant av ON ctr.AgentID=av.AgentID AND av.VarType=4 WHERE co.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY av.Name, co.FieldNumber, ce.StartDate
SELECT ce.CollectingEventID, ce.StationFieldNumber, ce.StartDate, ce.StartDatePrecision FROM collectingevent ce WHERE ce.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s)
SELECT gtp.GeologicTimePeriodID, gtp.FullName FROM geologictimeperiod gtp WHERE gtp.GeologicTimePeriodTreeDefID = GTPTREEDEFID AND gtp.IsBioStrat = 1 AND (%s) ORDER BY gtp.Name
SELECT jn.JournalID, jn.JournalName, jn.JournalAbbreviation, jn.ISSN, jn.GUID FROM journal jn WHERE (%s) ORDER BY jn.JournalAbbreviation
SELECT aps.AppraisalID, aps.AppraisalNumber FROM appraisal aps WHERE (%s) ORDER BY aps.AppraisalNumber

SELECT rw.ReferenceWorkID, rw.ReferenceWorkType, rw.Text1, ag.LastName, rw.WorkDate, rwv.Name, rwi.Identifier FROM referencework rw LEFT JOIN referenceworkvariant rwv on rwv.ReferenceWorkID=rw.ReferenceWorkID LEFT JOIN referenceworkidentifier rwi on rwi.ReferenceWorkID=rw.ReferenceWorkID LEFT JOIN author au on au.ReferenceWorkID=rw.ReferenceWorkID LEFT JOIN agent ag on ag.AgentID=au.AgentID WHERE (%s) ORDER BY rw.Text1
SELECT clt.CollectingTripID, clt.CollectingTripName, clt.StartDate FROM collectingtrip clt WHERE clt.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) ORDER BY clt.CollectingTripName
SELECT dv.DivisionID, dv.Name FROM division dv WHERE dv.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) ORDER BY dv.Name
SELECT prj.ProjectID, prj.ProjectName, prj.ProjectNumber FROM project prj WHERE prj.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY prj.ProjectName
SELECT ra.RepositoryAgreementID, ra.RepositoryAgreementNumber, ra.StartDate FROM repositoryagreement ra WHERE ra.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) ORDER BY ra.RepositoryAgreementNumber
select con.ContainerID, con.Name from container con where con.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY con.Name

SELECT distinct ag.AgentID, ag.LastName, ag.Abbreviation, ad.Address, ad.City, ad.State, ad.Postalcode, ad.Country FROM agent ag INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON ag.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID LEFT JOIN address ad ON (ag.AgentID = ad.AgentID AND ad.Ordinal=1) WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) GROUP BY ag.AgentID ORDER BY ag.Abbreviation, ag.LastName, ag.FirstName

SELECT pp.PreparationID, pp.Identifier as PrepIdentifier, ppt.Name, pp.SampleNumber, pp.Text1, frag.Identifier as FragIdentifier FROM preparation pp JOIN preptype ppt ON pp.PrepTypeID=ppt.PrepTypeID LEFT JOIN fragment frag on pp.PreparationID=frag.PreparationID WHERE pp.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY pp.Identifier

SELECT ag.AgentID, ag.FirstName, ag.LastName, av.Name FROM agent ag INNER JOIN agent_discipline ON ag.AgentID = agent_discipline.AgentID LEFT JOIN agentvariant av ON ag.AgentID = av.AgentID WHERE agent_discipline.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s) GROUP BY ag.AgentID ORDER BY ag.LastName, ag.FirstName, av.Name

SELECT fnbp.FieldNotebookPageID, PageNumber, ScanDate, fnps.StartDate, fnps.EndDate, fn.Name, fn.StartDate FROM fieldnotebookpage AS fnbp Inner Join fieldnotebookpageset AS fnps ON fnbp.FieldNotebookPageSetID = fnps.FieldNotebookPageSetID Inner Join fieldnotebook AS fn ON fnps.FieldNotebookID = fn.FieldNotebookID WHERE fnbp.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND (%s)

SELECT pp.PreparationID, pp.Identifier as PrepIdentifier, ac.AccessionNumber, t1.FullName, geo.FullName, ln.LoanNumber, t2.FullName FROM preparation pp LEFT JOIN accessionpreparation ap ON pp.PreparationID=ap.PreparationID LEFT JOIN loanpreparation lpo ON pp.PreparationID=lpo.PreparationID LEFT JOIN accession ac ON ap.AccessionID=ac.AccessionID LEFT JOIN loan ln ON lpo.LoanID=ln.LoanID LEFT JOIN taxon t1 ON lpo.TaxonID=t1.TaxonID LEFT JOIN taxon t2 ON ap.TaxonID=t2.TaxonID LEFT JOIN geography geo ON ap.GeographyID=geo.GeographyID WHERE pp.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY ac.AccessionNumber, ln.LoanNumber, t1.FullName, t2.FullName, geo.FullName

SELECT frag.FragmentID, frag.Identifier as FragIdentifier, frag.Description as FragDescription, ppt.Name, pp.Identifier as PrepIdentifier, pp.Description as PrepDescription FROM fragment frag LEFT JOIN preparation pp ON frag.PreparationID=pp.PreparationID LEFT JOIN preptype ppt ON pp.PrepTypeID=ppt.PrepTypeID WHERE pp.CollectionMemberID = COLMEMID AND (%s) ORDER BY pp.Identifier, frag.Identifier
